title: Miss Moss: The Long Winter (Book 2) Decodable Chapter Book
description: In the second book of the Miss Moss series, follow the charming cast of characters as they navigate winter in The Grove.Welcome back to The Grove and the delightful tale of Miss Moss! It is the end of fall. Miss Moss must get set for winter. What will happen in her first winter in The Grove?Miss Moss is a decodable chapter book series for developing readers. This book helps to make young readers, students with reading disabilities (such as dyslexia), and English Language Learners feel success as they read a chapter book. The book promotes the application of decoding skills by following decodable patterns and including high frequency words to increase reading accuracy , fluency , and comprehension . The pages are filled with delightful, full-color illustrations to engage early and struggling readers.To access helpful resources, such as sight word lists, please visit our www.mmottbooks.com
author: M. Mott
